title: Disconnected from client when I log in.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hi. I'm having issues with connecting to the client. I'm wondering if anyone else is having this issue. I checked my internet connection and everything is working just fine. (Obviously since I'm posting here) I was wondering if this is being looked at currently and if it's not just me.

Thanks. :)

replies.body: There were some problems with accessing chat servers overnight, but it should be okay now!  Be sure to check the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) for cases like that.  Let me know if you have any issues still!
Having this problem as well. the pinned tweet doesn't help

Yep. Pretty much everyone is having the problem
{{item:3070}}

Well im having the same issue and it is really annoying cause i play league only with at least one friend and cause of this "Bug" i cant im not even sure if i would call this a bug but more like someone coded something improperly?
